title: Schedule an OTA Update
description: A new OTA update is available, and the customer wants to schedule it to install overnight.

tasks.description: Confirm a new update is available for the customer's vehicle.
Explain the new features or improvements included in the update.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the contents of the update from the release notes.

tasks.description: Guide the customer to use their in-vehicle screen or mobile app to set a preferred installation time (e.g., 2 AM).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for scheduling the update.
